24 ROSNode::ROSNode(ros::NodeHandle nh) : nh_(nh){
25  odom = nh_.subscribe("/odom", 1, &ROSNode::odomCallBack, this);
26  laser_scan = nh_.subscribe("/scan", 1, &ROSNode::laserScanCallBack, this);
27  camera = nh_.subscribe("/usb_cam/image_raw", 1, &ROSNode::cameraCallBack, this);
28 
29  pub_vel = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/cmd_vel", 3, false);
30  // pub_goal = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("/move_base_simple/goal", 3, false);
31  thread_ = std::thread(&ROSNode::simulate, this);
32  thread_.detach();
33  // camera = nh_.subscribe("/camera/rgb/image_raw", 1000, &ROSNode::cameraCallBack, this);
34  // lidarSensor = nh_.subscribe("/sensor", 1000, &ROSNode::lidarCallBack, this);
35  // pub_vel = nh_.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("/cmd_vel", 3, false);
36 
37  pub_goal = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("/move_base_simple/goal", 3, false);
38 }
39 
40 void ROSNode::simulate()
41 {
42  // Simulate the environment using ROS
43  std::cout << "Simulating environment using ROS..." << std::endl;
44  // Add ROS simulation logic here
45  geometry_msgs::Twist pub;
46  pub.linear.x = 0.4;
47  pub_vel.publish(pub);
48  std::cout << "DRIVE" << std::endl;
49  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::seconds(5));
50  ROS_INFO_STREAM(image_);
51  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::seconds(5));
52  ROS_INFO_STREAM(bot_odom);
53 
54 }
55 
56 void ROSNode::odomCallBack(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr &msg)
57 {
58  robotMtx_.lock();
59  bot_odom = *msg;
60  robotMtx_.unlock();
61 }
62 
63 void ROSNode::laserScanCallBack(const sensor_msgs::LaserScanConstPtr &msg)
64 {
65  robotMtx_.lock();
66  bot_laser_scan = *msg;
67  robotMtx_.unlock();
68 }
69 
70 void ROSNode::cameraCallBack(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr &msg)
71 { // Type: sensor_msgs/Image
72  robotMtx_.lock();
73  image_ = *msg;
74  robotMtx_.unlock();
75 }

77 nav_msgs::Odometry ROSNode::returnOdom()

79  return bot_odom;
80 }

94 void ROSNode::sendCmd(int linear_x, int linear_y, int linear_z, int angular_x, int angular_y, int angular_z)
95 {
96  bot_vel.linear.x = linear_x;
97  bot_vel.linear.y = linear_y;
98  bot_vel.linear.z = linear_z;
99  bot_vel.angular.x = angular_x;
100  bot_vel.angular.y = angular_y;
101  bot_vel.angular.z = angular_z;
102  pub_vel.publish(bot_vel);
103 }
